attributes.action: allow the England football squad to be selected via a phone vote, as this saves the FA the bother of selecting a new manager.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically, every manager England has is a 'failure' to the public at the time they are sacked/resign; so therefore the public should have the power to select the squad that they want.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
